feed.title: blank
feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: what’s wrong with ducks?
entry.content: My advisor once told me that a duck can walk, swim, and fly, but excels at none. “Don’t be a duck” he said. I think it would be fun to be able to do so many things…
entry.summary: My advisor once told me that a duck can walk, swim, and fly, but excels at none. “Don’t be a duck” he said. I think it would be fun to be able to do so many things…
